about_the_game:
Click to find the kittens. Welcome to a world of wonders and adorable little kittens.

In this hidden object game, you’ll embark on a journey through beautiful, magical forest scenes, each filled with charming little kittens waiting to be found.

It’s a world where each kitty’s personality and unique traits are revealed to you as you progress through each level.

Key Features:

  • Adorable Kittens: Discover the exquisitely tiny but cute little kittens, each uniquely created in various art styles ranging from stylized to realistic to 3D cartoon types.

  • Relaxing Music: Enjoy beautiful, calming music that enhances your search and makes the experience even more enjoyable.

  • Untimed Gameplay: Sometimes it's nice to relax. Here you can take your time and enjoy the challenge without the pressure of a ticking clock.

  • Magical Forest Scenes: Explore two stunning forest environments that evoke a sense of wonder and fantasy (the full game has six enchanting scenes and a big special bonus level).

  • Hidden Kitties: Find over 220 kittens hidden throughout two stunning scenes (the full game has over 1100 kittens). Each kitten is accompanied by a photo and usually a fun fact about their personality and traits.

  • Automatic Saving: Your progress is saved automatically to the cloud, so you can always pick up right where you left off on any PC.

If you’re a cat lover, or a fan of hidden object games, or just someone looking for a relaxing break, try this game.

FAQs

What happens if I can’t find all the kittens in a level?

  • Don’t worry! You can take your time to find all the kittens because the game is designed to be relaxing and untimed, so there’s no rush. If you need a break, your progress will be saved automatically, allowing you to pick up where you left off.

    But if you’re really stuck, you can use a hint, which is available once every two minutes.

Can I start the next level before finishing my current level?

  • Yes you can start the next level anytime. The current level will be saved so that you can return to it whenever you like.

Should I play the Demo if I already own the full game?

  • Yes, because the demo contains two unique levels that are not part of the full game.

Why do I hear kittens meowing sometimes while playing the game?

  • Occasionally as your mouse cursor hovers over a hidden kitten, she will meow to give you an idea of her location to help you in the game.

name: Itty Bitty Little Kitties Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Discover tiny little kittens hidden throughout magical forest scenes while enjoying relaxing music in a calming, zen-like atmosphere. Some are easy to find, but others can be real little devils, so be warned! For cat lovers and hidden object game enthusiasts alike ♡♡♡
